name: Atomic Lighter
psi: Atomic Apocalypse: Continuously approaches the target, triggering a nuclear explosion after 5s that deals 2,040.3% AoE SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Kindling: Upon Death, increases Attack of all remaining allied Deviations on the battlefield by 150% for 8s.

name: Atomic Snail
psi: Quantum Charge: Quickly flies toward allies, restoring 60 Psi Energy to each ally touched, repeating 6 times. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Crazy Snail: Effect is enhanced by 45% when using Speed Up or Deviant Energy Conduit.

name: Butterfly Emissary
psi: Mitsuko Storm: Release 6 butterflies, each dealing 248.9% P.ATK DMG to enemies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Evasion Stance: 20% chance to gain a stack of Evasion Stance lasting 12s when taking DMG, up to 3 stacks.

name: Buzzy Bee
psi: Flower Thief: Buzzy Bee selects an enemy target, steals 60% of their Psi Energy, and restores 40% Psi Energy to an ally. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Bountiful Harvest: After 5 skill casts, recovers 10% Psi Energy.

name: By-the-Wind
psi: Wind Wall: Creates three wind walls that push enemies away and block incoming bullets for 8s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Turbulence: 10% chance to knock enemies into the air when dealing damage.

name: Chefosaurus Rex
psi: Hell's Kitchen: Creates a homing flame tornado that deals 90.8% SP.ATK DMG every 0.5s while inflicting Burn, lasting 13s. Burn deals 85.3% SP.ATK DMG per second. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Field Cooking: Upon killing a target, spawns a giant hamburger. Allies touching it restore 12.3% of Max HP to all allies within 5m.

name: Digby Boy
psi: Ore Crushing Process: Grows larger and frenziedly strikes the target 37 times, each hit dealing 41.5% P.ATK DMG and knocking back the target. The final strike deals 54% P.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Workhorse: When HP falls below 30%, increases P.DEF by 60%.

name: Dr-Teddy
psi: Panacea: Transforms into a giant bear, healing surrounding allies every 0.5s for 180% of his Attack, 6 times in total. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Healer's Heart: When healing other targets, restores 20% of the healing amount to self.

name: Dreamcatcher
psi: Dreamcatcher: Deploys a large net at the target location. After 3s, enemies within range take 1672.5% P.ATK DMG and fall asleep for 12s. Taking damage ends the sleeping state. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Dreamless Tonight: Deviations controlled by the Dreamcatcher receive a 40% DMG Boost for 10s.

name: Electric Eel
psi: High Voltage Ring: Releases a 20m electric ring, dealing 254.3% SP.ATK DMG to all enemies in its path and restoring 160 Psi Energy to allies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Electric Feedback: Gains 0.5 Psi Energy every time damage is dealt.

name: Extradimensional Cat
psi: Cat Gathering: The cat dispels all negative states from allies and boosts their P.ATK and SP.ATK by 158.7% for 10s. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Cat's Virtues: When the cat buffs allies, restores HP equal to 3% of its own Max HP.

name: Festering Gel
psi: Gel Shield: Encases an ally in Festering Gel, granting a shield equal to 3.3% of their Max HP. Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Activate: Increase the Healing Boost effect by 20%.

name: Fetch-lot-Bunny
psi: Bunny Crouch: Enters a defensive stance, taunting nearby enemies and gaining a shield equal to 1.5% of Max HP. After 5s, deals P.ATK DMG equal to 30% of damage taken to surrounding enemies. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Fairytale Guardian: Increases P.ATK and P.DEF by 18%.

name: Flame Essence
psi: Blazing Croak: Creates an expanding flame storm around the caster that deals 209% SP.ATK DMG to enemies within range and reduces the Elemental Defense of burned units by 20%. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Spring Legs: After casting the skill 3 times, leaps behind the target, gaining Super Armor during the leap. Enemies hit along the way are burned for 5s, taking 4% SP.ATK DMG per second.

name: Gingerbread House
psi: Happy Thanksgiving: Gingerbread House feeds all allies 3 desserts with random buff effects. Buffs from the same dessert can stack. Consumes 360 Psi Energy.
passive: Limited-time Feeding: Every 16s, the Gingerbread House feeds an ally a dessert with a random buff. Graham Cracker: Restores 2.8% Max HP. Chocolate: Increases P.DEF and SP.DEF by 81% for 8s. Candy Cane: Increases P.ATK by 130% for 8S. Lollipop: Increases SP.ATK by 130% for 8s.

name: Growshroom
psi: Colossal Pressure: Transforms into a colossal mushroom and leaps at the target, dealing P.ATK DMG equal to 9.8% of Max HP to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Divine Grace: During sunny weather, P.DEF +50%; during rainy weather, SP.DEF +50%.

name: Grumpy Bulb
psi: Chaos Mist: Generates dense miasma around the caster, dealing 1089.1% SP.ATK DMG to enemies and disrupting neural activity. All enemy AoE DMG will affect all units. Consumes 500 Psi Energy.
passive: Budding: After entering combat, spawns a small bulb randomly within 6m every 5s. Contact with an enemy triggers an explosion that reduces their Elemental and Physical Defense by 8%.

passive: Robot Leader: Allies shielded by H37 or affected by H37's Shield Break gain 11.1% P.DEF and SP.DEF.

passive: Porcelain: Reduces DMG taken by 27% when HP is above 50%.

passive: Blazing Fury: For every 30% HP lost, SP.ATK +25.5%.

passive: Big Ruckus: Randomly reduces the cooldown of one battle skill by 2s every 5s.

passive: Relaxation: Increases P.DEF and SP.DEF by 15% when enemies are nearby; increases P.ATK by 30% when no enemies are present.

name: Tar Pudding
psi: Giant Molotov Cocktail: Tar Pudding becomes frenzied, creating an 8m-radius burning aura around itself for 10 seconds. Enemies within range take 55.17% SP.ATK DMG per second, and those with Flammable status are detonated, dealing 356.4% AoE SP.ATK DMG in a 3m radius. After entering battle, each use of Crude Oil Digging or Crude Oil Spill increases Molotov Cocktail DMG by 25% (max 100%). Consumes 450 Psi Energy.
passive: Crude Oil Digging: Every 40s, digs up oil beneath itself, increasing its own SP.ATK by 20% for 10s and leaving a 2m-radius oil pool lasting 20s. Enemies passing through the oil pool become Flammable. Flammable enemies ignited by fire-based skills take 17.49% SP.ATK DMG per second with Burn effect for 8s.

name: Upper World Spawn
psi: Angel's Protection: Summons wings to protect allied Deviations. 110% of DMG they take is reflected as SP.ATK DMG to attackers for 10s. Consumes 300 Psi Energy.
passive: Eggshell Protection: Reflects 20% of DMG received back to the attacker.

name: Voodoo Doll
psi: Doom Curse: Voodoo Doll curses all enemies, applying Heal Block and converting 200% of healing received into DMG for 25s. Consumes 350 Psi Energy.
passive: Rusty Nail: Units damaged by the Voodoo Doll are inflicted with Healing Block, nullifying all healing effects for 5s.

name: Whalepup
psi: Underwater World: Enter the underwater world for 10s. Every 5s, all enemies within a 25m radius are trapped in the water prison, triggering twice in total. The water prison lasts 4s before exploding, dealing 259.5% SP.ATK DMG. Consumes 400 Psi Energy.
passive: Water Prison: When dealing damage, suspends the target in a water prison for 3s. Can only trigger once on the same target within 10s. When the water prison expires, it explodes, dealing SP.ATK DMG equal to 70% of Attack to the target.
